content: उद्धारः {@--1@} Drawing out, extraction. {@--2@} Deliverance, redemption, saving, rescuing, extrication. {@--3@} Raising, lifting up. {@--4@} Deduction, a part to be set aside. {@--5@} (In law) A part to be set aside from the paternal property for the benefit of the eldest son; the surplus allowed by Law to the eldest beyond the shares of the younger brothers; <ls>Ms. 9. 112.</ls> {@--6@} The sixth part of booty taken in war which belongs to the king; <ls>Ms. 7. 97.</ls> {@--7@} An obligation. {@--8@} Debt, particularly such as bears no interest. {@--9@} Recovering property. {@--10@} Marching out. {@--11@} Citing (a passage), quoting. {@--12@} Final beatitude. {@--13@} Prosperity, elevation. --रा The plant गुडूची. --रं A fire-place.
